summary: This is a Bank of America personal signature card and substitute Form W-9 for a savings account, indicating the account holder's certification of their taxpayer identification number, U.S. citizenship, and exemption from backup withholding and FATCA reporting. The document was electronically acknowledged on October 25, 2017.

events.title: Account Document Electronically Acknowledged
events.description: A Bank of America personal signature card and substitute Form W-9 for a savings account was electronically acknowledged by the customer.

keyFacts: The document is a Bank of America personal signature card and substitute Form W-9 for a savings account.
The account holder certified they are a U.S. citizen, provided a taxpayer identification number, and are not subject to backup withholding or FATCA reporting.
The customer electronically acknowledged the document on October 25, 2017.
The form includes standard banking certifications under penalties of perjury regarding tax identification and withholding status.
